commonBarriers: Neck or lower back discomfort from poor form

progressionPlan: Week 1-2: 15-20 sit-ups daily (focus on form). Week 3-4: 30-40 sit-ups, add variations (bicycle crunches, leg raises). Week 5-8: 50-100 sit-ups, progressive sets (3x25, 4x25), or timed planks between sets.
